name: Hand Simulator
description: There are many different levels where you can play with spinners, plunge into the subtleties of handling weapons, milk a cow, take part in a Mexican duel with your friends, have a good time fishing, play chess or simply chat in an anonymous club.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3700 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible audio device Additional Notes: Keyboadr, Mouse (No need VR helmet, it is optional)
